list_translation_mean.translate_mean: sự hy sinh vật để cúng tế

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of slaughtering an animal or person or surrendering a possession as an offering to God or to a divine or supernatural figure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they offer sacrifices to the spirits
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Họ cung cấp sự hy sinh cho các linh hồn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: offer or kill as a religious sacrifice.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the goat was sacrificed at the shrine
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: con dê đã hy sinh tại đền thờ
